Recap: Salerno tried to enlist Reva's services, not taking no for an answer. Cassie confronted Edmund, only to find the mysterious box contained nothing but cigars. Harley lost track of Brad Green.

Joey found a distraught Edmund hugging Tammy (thanks to Lizzy). Later, Tammy received an envelope containing the Spring Fling tickets. Someone came into the wine cellar to pick up the money. Gus pulled his gun and said It's you?'
Transcript: Jeffrey: Gus, I know you can't respond, so just listen. We can't do anything about Cassie getting in the way down there. So for her own protection, if something happens, take her in, and anyone else who gets involved for that matter. You got it?
Harley: It's terrier. I don't like this. Cassie and Edmund are tight. How could he think she wouldn't be by his side all night? There's no way he'd risk her finding out.
Jeffrey: Well, I'm just concerned about the big picture right now. Cassie's paranoid, and she's running on emotions. She could compromise this whole investigation. We need a break.
Edmund: Why did you follow me down here, Cassie?
Cassie: That box. It's just like the box you gave vinnie Salerno, and it sailed through customs in your diplomatic mailbag.
Edmund: Yes, it did. What are you talking about?
Cassie: And you knew no one was going to see it, not even the police.
Edmund: The police?
Cassie: I mean, this is perfect, Edmund. It's just perfect, isn't it?
Edmund: What are talking about?
Cassie: Edmund, why did you do it? Was it the money? Was Salerno blackmailing you?
Edmund: Blackmailing me into doing what?
Cassie: Oh, come on, Edmund! I am not an idiot, okay? Would you just admit it? You have been running drugs into this country from San Cristobel.
Edmund: Drugs?!

Reva: Mr. Salerno...
Salerno: Vinnie.
Reva: Mr. Salerno, you know, maybe we could do this some other time. You could come to the studio.
Salerno: Yeah, you know, I just want to tell you how amazing you were the other day, you know? Everything you predicted came true. I'd like to find out just how much more amazing you can be.
Tammy: Uncle josh, you should be dancing.
Josh: Hello. Yes, I would like to be dancing, but I can't find my wife. And I don't understand where she is. (Chuckles)
Tammy: Ah. Stood up.
Josh: Yeah.

Josh: No. Sorry.
Joey: You're trippin', Lizzie. Tammy would never kiss Edmund.

Joey: No. No, no, no. Wait. That is gross, okay? There's no way... you saw them?
Lizzie: I know it's weird and everything, but I had front-row seats.

Joey: I guess I'm just stupid, right?

Cassie (whispering): Cigars?
Edmund: Cigars, Cassie. Cigars. Somebody call a cop.

Jeffrey: Okay, let's see the drugs. Okay, great. I want you to put this thing into Vinnie's hands at the club, okay, and then get out of there. Once my guys see you leave, they'll know to move in.
Danny: Where are you going to be?
Jeffrey: I've got to wrap up a few things here first. Oh, and give me your comm system.
Danny: No, no. There's no time for that. Let's go. Come on.
Jeffrey: Danny, it's not exactly a wise idea to be walking into the club wired for sound, now, is it?
Danny: If he sees the wire, so what? A wire and a smile on my face will be the last things he sees before you haul him off.
Jeffrey: You're becoming a loose cannon at the 11th hour? Okay, look, keep the wire. Do your job and get out of there.
Danny: O'Neill, my only job is making sure it's safe for Michelle to come out of her coma. (Applause)
[SCENE_BREAK]
Tammy: Edmund?
Edmund: Tammy, I'm sorry. Whatever it is, it's not a good time.
Tammy: What's wrong?
Edmund: Well, your mother and I are fighting, I guess.
Tammy: About what?
Edmund: It doesn't matter. It really doesn't matter. Tammy... you know, I never apologized to you.
Tammy: For what?

Edmund: For jumping to a whole lot of conclusions when you and Joey... well, up at the cabin, about what you and Joey might have... I made assumptions, and I shouldn't have done that. I'm sorry. They always end up badly.
Tammy: What's going on, uncle Edmund?

Edmund: "Uncle Edmund." I like hearing that. It doesn't matter. It really doesn't matter. Tammy, you are young, you are vibrant and you are full of life. You and Joey, be honest with each other about everything. Talk about... rehash every plan, every intention, everything, until you're blue in the face, because it's worth it.
Tammy: Some "don't make the same mistakes I did" advice?
Edmund: Yeah. I'm sorry. I guess I'm a little too sad to hone a rapier wit.
Tammy: The best cure for sadness? A hug from somebody who cares.
Edmund: Yeah, well, in my life, I guess those people have just been in short supply... (applause)
[SCENE_BREAK]
Joey: Lizzie, I can't find Tammy anywhere.
Cassie: ...And their generosity.
Lizzie: Why don't you check outside?
Joey: I've been out there... (sighs) all right, I'll try again.

Cassie: ...To the learning and discovery for the children of San Cristobel. And if Prince Richard were here, he would be just as excited. Probably more. (Laughs) (laughter) thank you very much. (Applause)
[SCENE_BREAK]
Harley: Gus, Jeffrey, we've got a problem.
Jeffrey: Well, that's not something I want to hear.
Gus: Can you just talk to me? Tell me, what's going on?
Harley: It's brad.
Gus: What, is he on to you? Did he make you?
Jeffrey: Look, I don't care if he did. Stay with him.
Harley: Well, that is going to be tough. He's gone.
Gus: Coop, come on. You can't find brad anywhere?
Harley: When Alan started his speech, everyone moved into a big clump. He was out of my sight line for a second.
Jeffrey: Yeah, well, that's all it takes, isn't it?
Harley: Thank you for stating the obvious.
Gus: All right, so the guy got lost in the big crowd. Big deal. He's going to come down here, he's going to finish the job, and I'm going to make the bust, okay? Everybody just sit tight.
Jeffrey: Affirmative on that, because brad may or may not be our man.
Gus: Is this about Alan again?
Jeffrey: Look, I'm just saying that whoever does come down there is the person that we want.
Harley: Let me go find brad.
Jeffrey: You cover the closest exit. That's all.
Bellhop: Miss Winslow? I was asked to give you this.
Tammy: What is it?
Bellhop: Someone left it at the front desk.
Tammy: Two tickets to the summer fling? "Thought you could use these. Go with someone you care about. Joey." I knew something was wrong. I knew it.
Lizzie: Aw. I hope you didn't buy your dress already.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Danny: Reva? What are you...?
Reva: Uh, I don't really know why I'm here.
Salerno: Daniel, glad you could join us.
Danny: Vinnie, I didn't know you were going to be having company.
Salerno: Is that my bag?
Danny: Vinnie, I know you don't like to explain things, but...
Salerno: Then don't ask. I just went a couple of rounds with your cousin. I'm not in the mood to trade shots with you, too.
Danny: All right. But Reva shouldn't be here right now.
Salerno: What is this? All of a sudden, everybody thinks they can tell me how to run my business.
Danny: Vinnie...
Salerno: The bag, Daniel. Reva and I were just discussing business arrangements. We're almost done.
Danny: What kind of business?
Salerno: None of yours. The bag.
Danny: Vinnie, look, I don't know what you told Tony, but don't you think we should let Reva go to the party? She shouldn't be here right now. You and I have some business to discuss.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Jeffrey: Did you both copy that?
Harley: I didn't get that. What's going on?

Jeffrey: Well, there's going to be a change of plans. I've got to get over to the social club. Somehow, Salerno got Reva over there. That means Gus, you are now the point man. Whoever comes down there, you nail them-- and I don't care who it is, Spaulding or otherwise. Can you do that?
Gus: You know that I can do it. Coop, what have you got for me? Anything?
Harley: I just don't see brad anywhere.
Gus: Yeah, well, brad green coming back down here is exactly what we both want. You know what I'm saying?
Harley: You can do this.
Gus: Yeah. Do I have a choice?
Harley: I've got your back.
Gus: Honey, you've got more than my back. You've got my heart. (Whispering): Somebody's coming. Somebody's coming.
Harley: I'm going to the cellar door.
Gus: Police! Put your hands in the air! Show me your hands! It's you? Next, on "Guiding Light."
Reva: I'll leave and you two do whatever it is you do.
Jeffrey: Go.
Salerno: You stay put. You give me the bag.
Harley: Brad green has got the money. It's him, and he is going to prison for a long, long time.
